alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Baldwin, Wilkinson, southeastern Bibb, Twiggs, south central Hancock and western Washington Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Beulah to McIntyre to near Huber, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Sandersville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Toomsboro, Oconee, Danville, Allentown, Deepstep, Midway-Hardwick, Marion, Beulah, Nicklesville, District Path, Hebron, Hardwick and Warthen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
